text.__SUMMARY__: Trimeresurus flavomaculatus halieus is a venomous pitviper subspecies endemic to the Philippines.
text.Geographic range: It is found in the Philippines on the island of Polillo. The type locality given is "Island of Polillo, P.I." (= Philippine Islands).
text.Taxonomy: Gumprecht (2001, 2002) relegated this subspecies to the synonymy of Trimeresurus flavomaculatus.
